|rad2oui = C8:D7:19 |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-product/?pid=01t80000003KQoBAAW Support page] "3751-24600104R" is silkscreened on the BCM4360 wireless module. :1MB Serial Flash + 128MB NAND Flash :C8:D7:19 OUI {{WiFiCert|WFA15975|07/16/2012}} ==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/31802-cisco-unveils-its-draft-80211ac-router-and-bridge ''Cisco Unveils Its Draft 802.11ac Router and Bridge'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tomato-hyzoom-bwq518-releases.70364/#post-252949 ''EA6500v1 Hyzoom test build'' on '''linksysinfo.org'''] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=162802 ''Fractal's post'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :(w/ serial dump) - ''DD-WRT'' test build on page 5 ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ===CFE log===
